languageKey.label: Show article in the 'Newest content elements'
Check this, if you want to display this article in the plugin 'Newest content elements (NCE)'.
Additional parameters for using this content in plugin 'Newest content elements (NCE)'
Start time - only for 'Newest content elements (NCE)'
Value must equal or be greater than 'access->starttime'. If value is empty, it will use value of 'access->starttime' and then the value of db-field 'crdate'
tt_content:starttime
Update time - only for 'Newest content elements (NCE)'
tt_content:starttime
Stop time - only for 'Newest content elements (NCE)'
Value must equal or be lower than 'access->endtime'. If value is empty, it will use value of 'access->endtime'
tt_content:endtime
Short teaser text for this content element. Required if the content has no 'bodytext'

'Newest content elements (NCE)' use this text if not empty. It overrides the 'bodytext'. You should avoid excessive formating, images/tables and so on are removed in output. Filling this field is required if the content element has no 'bodytext' as default, but you have to check this yourself or empty content is outputted.
